issue.title: Can not build gazebo on Arch linux from source with gcc 9.2.0

content.raw:
I have made two pull request in order to be able to install the last version of gazebo.

I do no think that this pull request can be merged now. Need to be sure that the last version of gazebo depends only on OpenAL > 1.20

The second pull request can be merged without any further issues.
content.html:
I have made two pull request in order to be able to install the last version of gazebo.

I do no think that this pull request can be merged now. Need to be sure that the last version of gazebo depends only on OpenAL > 1.20

The second pull request can be merged without any further issues.
